definition: Xindian or Hsintien city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
Xindian or Hsintien city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Xindian or Hsintian Creek, one of the rivers through Taipei, Taiwan

sentences.english: It is about our new store. Do you have any idea about this?
sentences.chinese: 是關於我們的新店，你有什麼想法？

sentences.english: The newly-opened store inherits South Beauty's constant features of fashion and innovation.
sentences.chinese: 新店沿襲了俏江南時尚創新的經營特色。

sentences.english: You will help recruit the best optometrists for our new stores;
sentences.chinese: 您將協助我們的新店招募優秀，專業的驗光師。

sentences.english: Face before hiking, Qin Feng says apt her ugg boots new store starts train ugg tall builds threatening force this time.
sentences.chinese: 臨走前，秦風對她說這次新店開業要造一下聲勢。

sentences.english: Mr. Warden said he would manage the new store.
sentences.chinese: 沃登先生會管理這家新店。

sentences.english: At first she thought they were admiring the high-tech store's modern design.
sentences.chinese: 起先她以爲這些人是在欣賞新店中的高科技現代設計。

sentences.english: The owner of "New Store" Stationery Store came to Hengshan Township from other county.
sentences.chinese: 新店文具印刷行的老闆是從外地到橫山鄉落腳。

sentences.english: Wow, I'm amazed at that new store, I got a cart full of things dirt-cheap .
sentences.chinese: 哇，那家新店真讓我喫驚，我淘了一車的便宜貨。

sentences.english: Louis Vuitton is opening a store in Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 路易威登剛在新加坡開了一家新店。

sentences.english: Apple is pinning big hopes on its new store in Covent Garden. Photograph: Jonathan Hordle/Rex Features
sentences.chinese: 蘋果公司對考文特花園新店寄予厚望。

sentences.english: Plans new store opening activities and plans personnel transfers as required.
sentences.chinese: 計劃新店開業活動，需要時安排人員轉崗。

sentences.english: What is more astonishing is the way each new store is received.
sentences.chinese: 更爲驚人的還是新店開張後的反響。

sentences.english: I seek the opportunity to manage a newly-opened store.
sentences.chinese: 我尋求機會去管理一家新店。

sentences.english: Tze-Chiang Express was passing the bridge over Hsin-Tian River.
sentences.chinese: 推拉式自強特快車通過新店溪橋的歷史鏡頭。

sentences.english: Our brand new "M no Yakiniku" opened by Dotonbori river.
sentences.chinese: 同品牌旗下的新店“M燒肉”，已在道頓堀河邊開幕。

definition: to open a business/to open a practice/open (for business)
to open a business/first transaction of a business day
